title: Stream: Tyler, The Creator â€“ WOLF
body:
With the album leaking online earlier this week, **Tyler, The Creator** has made his forthcoming third record **_WOLF_** available for streaming online.

With guest appearances from Frank Ocean, Domo Genesis, Pharrell and Casey Veggies, amongst others, it hits shelves on 2 April. Check out the full release below.

With guest appearances from Frank Ocean, Domo Genesis, Pharrell and Casey Veggies, amongst others, it hits shelves on 2 April. Check out the full release below.
